==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Rongo:''' Well, now, if it isn't you, {{Traveler}}? What do you say? Ready to hone your fighting spirit here in the Great Training Arena of the Springs?
:'''Rongo:''' The Spiritdoors you activated haven't been fixed, sure, but this place is more than enough to serve as a surfing training ground!
:'''Rongo:''' Come, enjoy surfing freely in these waters!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Rongo}} also known as ''Rongo-mā-Tāne'' is a deity in {{w|Māori mythology}} as the god of cultivated plants.
